name: Angry Birds Trilogy
description:
Squawk! Play the worldwide phenomenon in a whole new way: with new features and gorgeous graphics, now optimized for the PlayStation®Vita system! Whether you're a champion pig popper or a fledgeling bird flinger, Angry Birds Trilogy offers fun, challenging, and addictive gameplay for fans of all ages!
Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.
1 player(s)
Network Features
60KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Dual Analog Sticks
Location Data Acquisition Service
Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
Angry Birds™ Trilogy
